Topic.Title: Chinese currency manipulation hurts companies like KO

Message.Msg: If Romney is elected, he'll end up making the inevitable trip to China with a promise to lay down the hammer on them, a nation that has bailed out our country countless times. He'll be treated like the King of Kings there and will be exposed to riches that even he couldn't afford in his wildest dreams. He'll also be worshipped like a demigod by workers who will say that they have him to thank for their jobs and would have starved to death without him. In 2016, his political opponent will repeatedly accuse him of laying down for China and will promise to lay the smack down on them, if elected. Same old dance, different dancer. *yawn*

Message.Title: BECAREFUL OF ROMNESIA! GO ON YOUTUBE AND CHECK OUT ROMNEY'S PAST VIEWS.
